item.title: Volantis
item.description: ![[Aedra/Locations/attachments/slohginfizz_SUBJECT_thousands_of_massive_water_fountains_STYLE__2c69e695-330e-4684-b4b2-cf015ff9b5e8.png]] Intro The Floating city of Volantis is a freehold city located on the highest point in [[Aedra/Locations/The Mansar|The Mansar]] Mountain range.
